document_data.name: Mareldraea Hawkguard
document_data.mainbody:
Lady '''Mareldraea Hawkguard''' ({{Pronounce|Mar|ELL|dray|ah|refs=<ref name=EGP-ST />}}) was the ruler of [[Shadowdale]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].<ref name=EGP-ST />
{{quote|''So will you do the sensible thing, or be governed by your ire and wants?''|''One of Mareldraea's favorite sayings.''<ref name=EGP-ST />}}
document_data.Description: Mareldraea had an average stature and physique, with disheveled black hair and gray eyes.<ref name=EGP-ST />
document_data.Personality:
Lady Mareldraea Hawkguard was a calm and easygoing individual with a gentle voice and a demeanor that exuded warmth. Despite her affable nature, she possessed a steely resolve and stubbornness that belied her outward appearance. Fearless and unyielding, she couldn't be intimidated by anyone or anything.<ref name=EGP-ST />

She held a deep reverence for Shadowdale, viewing it as a vital community where [[human]]s, [[fey]], and [[elf|elvenkind]] coexisted harmoniously. Her vision for the advancement of Shadowdale focused on sustainable practices, such as improving irrigation, drainage, and crop yields while prioritizing soil renewal and environmental harmony.<ref name=EGP-ST />
document_data.Relationships:
Mareldraea was the great-granddaughter of [[Mayheir Hawksguard]].<ref name=EGP-ST />

Despite her political clashes with other dale leaders, like [[Scardale]] and [[Archendale]], Lady Hawkguard had a knack for reconciling differences and building personal relationships. Dalefolk regarded her as one of their own, appreciating her genuine interest in their lives and well-being.<ref name=EGP-ST />

As of the early 1490s DR, Mareldraea was unwed and had no public partner.<ref name=EGP-ST />
document_data.History: In [[1490 DR]], aware that her mental faculties were beginning to decline, Lady [[Khara Sulwood]] started training successors. In [[Nightal]] of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, she resigned the lordship and handed the [[Twisted Tower]] over to Lady Mareldraea.<ref name=EGP-ST />
